item.description:
The Socialist Party meets at 5:00 pm on the third Sunday of every month in the Lucy Parsons Center.

Members, supporters, and the curious are all invited to attend.

The Lucy Parsons Center is located at 549 Columbus Ave. in the South End, near the Mass Ave. T stop on the Orange Line, the Symphony T stop on the Green Line (E), and the #1 bus line.

See you there!
item.why: These organizing meetings are the lifeblood of our local. These monthly membership meetings are where we hear updates from everyone and make decisions for future action.
item.name: Local Organizing Meeting
